mapper.insert:
LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE #{filePath} INTO TABLE
stock_history
index_history
FIELDS ESCAPED BY '\\' TERMINATED BY ',' ENCLOSED BY '"' LINES TERMINATED BY '\r\n' (`realDate`, `stockCode`, `stockName`, `close`, `high`, `low`, `open`, `lastClose`, `increase`, `increaseRate`, `exchangeRate`, `dealQty`, `dealMoney`, `totalMarketCap`, `negotiableMarketCap`);
